ModulePrefs.title: NAAP lab - Hertzsprung-Russel Diagram Lab
ModulePrefs.author: Sten Govaerts
ModulePrefs.description: The NAAP HR Diagram Lab explores the Hertzsprung-Russell diagram and those areas necessary to understand the diagram such as (but not limited to) the different kinds of spectrum, spectral classification, and luminosity class. In short, this module provides a fairly in-depth tutorial in reading HR diagrams.
